Enum Class StringUtils.Clipping

@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: StringUtils.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $") @API(status=STABLE, since="0.0.5") public static enum StringUtils.Clipping extends Enum<StringUtils.Clipping>
The clipping mode that is used for the method StringUtils.pad(CharSequence,int,char,Padding,Clipping)
Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Version:
$Id: StringUtils.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $
Since:
0.0.3

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    CLIPPING_ABBREVIATE
    If an input String is longer than the target length, it will be abbreviated to that length, by calling StringUtils.abbreviate(CharSequence, int) with that String.
    CLIPPING_ABBREVIATE_MIDDLE
    If an input String is longer than the target length, it will be abbreviated to that length, by calling StringUtils.abbreviateMiddle(CharSequence, int) with that String.
    CLIPPING_CUT
    If an input String is longer than the target length, it will be just shortened to that length.
    CLIPPING_NONE
    If an input String is already longer than the target length, it will be returned unchanged.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • CLIPPING_NONE

      public static final StringUtils.Clipping CLIPPING_NONE
      If an input String is already longer than the target length, it will be returned unchanged.

    • CLIPPING_CUT

      public static final StringUtils.Clipping CLIPPING_CUT
      If an input String is longer than the target length, it will be just shortened to that length.

    • CLIPPING_ABBREVIATE

      public static final StringUtils.Clipping CLIPPING_ABBREVIATE
      If an input String is longer than the target length, it will be abbreviated to that length, by calling StringUtils.abbreviate(CharSequence, int) with that String. The minimum length for the padded String is 4.

    • CLIPPING_ABBREVIATE_MIDDLE

      public static final StringUtils.Clipping CLIPPING_ABBREVIATE_MIDDLE
      If an input String is longer than the target length, it will be abbreviated to that length, by calling StringUtils.abbreviateMiddle(CharSequence, int) with that String. The minimum length for the padded String is 5.
